tags.name: ef-accordion
tags.description:
Used to display a group of `Collapse` control.
Only one item will be able to expand by default but you can customize its behavior.

attributes.name: auto-collapse-disabled
attributes.description: Allow multiple sections expand at the same time

attributes.name: spacing
attributes.description: Add spacing to content section in all collapse items

attributes.name: collapse-animation-disabled
attributes.description: Allow the collapse animation to be disabled

properties.name: autoCollapseDisabled
properties.description: Allow multiple sections expand at the same time

properties.name: spacing
properties.description: Add spacing to content section in all collapse items

properties.name: collapseAnimationDisabled
properties.description: Allow the collapse animation to be disabled

slots.name: header-left
slots.description: Slot to add custom contents to the left side of header e.g. ef-icon, ef-checkbox

slots.name: header-right
slots.description: Slot to add custom contents to the right side of header e.g. ef-icon, ef-checkbox
